name: depend
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 to be decided by or to change according to the stated thing: Whether or not we go to Mexico for our holiday depends on the cost. [ + question word ] I might go to the cinema tomorrow - it depends what time I get home from work. it (all) depends B1 informal
it is not decided yet: "Are you going to Emma's party?" "I don't know, it depends - we might be going away that weekend."
